availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thaddeus A. Smith (Hopkins Co., KY, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Hulda P. Smith. Father of Mary E. Smith, Lawrence Smith, Edward Smith, David Smith, Walter Smith, and Mark Smith. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 406B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 606.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Precinct 1, p. 17A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Hopkins County, KY, July 1863, p. 54 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Thaddeus A. Smith (1829-1882)," Memorial #135621972, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/135621972 (accessed October 29, 2020).
